text: Mark Ronson and his wife Josephine de La Baume have reportedly parted ways, after five and half years together. According to TMZ, the French beauty filed for divorce from the 41 - year - old DJ on Thursday - citing irreconcilable differences as reason for their split. The site reports that the 32 - year - old has listed April 21 as their official date of separation, which is five months shy of their sixth anniversary. Scroll down for video End of an era : Mark Ronson and his wife Josephine de La Baume have reportedly split up, after five and half years together The pair have no children together but is believed that Josephine, who is an actress, singer and model, is asking for spousal support.
